DOC.brief_summary: Study to evaluate the effects of AUGMENTIN 1gm in the treatment of Skin and Soft tissue infections
DOC.brief_title: AUGMENTIN 1gm In Skin And Soft Tissue Infection
DOC.criteria: having diagnosed uncomplicated soft tissue infection (e.g furuncle, cellulitis) has given freely documented consent. antibiotics have renal or hepatic insufficiency systemic toxicity pregnancy lactation hypersensitivity to penicillin or Betalactam antibiotics
